definitions: A peculiar or unusual habit or way of behaving that is specific to an individual.
A structural or behavioral characteristic peculiar to an individual or group.
A peculiarity of constitution or temperament.
examples: His biggest idiosyncrasy was his habit of wearing mismatched socks.
The software had a few idiosyncrasies that made it difficult to use.
Her artistic style was marked by several unique idiosyncrasies.
